@Twokinds May I have question? I noticed that my suggestion about Laura's sister not appears on poll. Has it reached you? I mean, maybe it was inappropriate some way and I should't send it again in the next round. Or it just exceeded some limit?
It wasn't in the poll because you had a suggestion fulfilled already last week.
It might have also been some other reason, though I usually try to message people beforehand if their suggestion is not appropriate, a spoiler, or some reason why I can't draw it.
Often, I can't say why I can't draw it, simply because... saying why might be a spoiler.
